borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference: 2021/04082/FUL dated 16th February 2022 for the "Erection of a front and rear roof extension, involving an increase in the ridge height; erection of a rear extension at second floor level, over part of the existing back addition; replacement of the existing UPVC windows to the front elevation with UPVC double glazed sash windows; alterations to the roof of the existing single storey back addition with a new low pitch roof and a fixed eave rooflight; replacement of French doors to the rear elevation at ground floor level with a window; and replacement of a window to the rear elevation at ground floor level with bi-folding doors." Amendment sought is a change of material for the roof tiles from proposed zinc shingles to Cembrit Jutland Black Roof Slate 600 x 300mm black roof slate detail from manufacturer ( https://www.cembrit.co.uk/roofing/fibre-cement-slates/jutland ).
